entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:05 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:14 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 after midnight then light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 09:11 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
